game.name: Vampires and Garlic
game.description:
No, you are going to taste the delicious mashed potatoes made with the help of commonly used ingredient that pungent odor can open up your nostrils in this brand new action-packed challenge. You have to use the garlic as a weapon to fight against a horde of vampires in Vampires and Garlic. Does not sound it pretty exciting and challenging? We are pretty sure that controlling the angle and strength of your throws can amaze you just after a few seconds when you enter this fun challenge. 
You would have the strong and effective garlic bombs to throw at your pesky vampires and clear them from the screen. Be careful while aiming at your enemies as you have limited garlic bombs to use in this html5 shooting game! Keep your eyes on the garlic count so that you can accomplish your goal before you run out of the bombs!  There is a wide array of hindrances like dangerous terrain, multiple types of objects like TNTs, pulleys and boxes. 
It is easy to adjust the power level by just moving the mouse or tapping the screen. Once it is done, do not forget to click on the screen to throw your garlic bomb at your opponents. Put your shooting abilities to the test to knock out all of the vampires before your all garlic bombs expire. There are 30 unique and challenging levels to play through in this simple point and click based game. The lovely fun Halloween theme and music will be enough to keep you glued to the screen for hours. Good luck to conquer many such blood suckers in our other popular tiles from the new action games!
